text: Ara tomadera upare aparadha habe na tomara naridera bibahera prastabe ya abhase ingite prakasa kara, athaba gopana rakho tomadera antare. Allah janena ye tomara tadera smarana karabe, kintu bhadrabhabe kathabarta bala chara gopane tadera sathe oyada karo na, ara bibahabandhana pakapaki karo na ye paryanta na tadera nirdharita samayasima pechomya! Ara jene rekho -- allah niscaya'i janena ya tomadera antare ache, ata'eba tamra samparke satarka ha'o, ara jene rekho ye nihsandeha allah tranakarta, parama sahisnu.
